name: Dino Dilemma
description:
Inspired by Google's T-Rex auto runner game, but with new mechanics!

I took the base mechanics of that game, and introduced a bunch of original mechanics of my own. Such as meteors falling from the sky you need to dodge, as well as a simple life system. I also created various aesthetic elements and a few nice menu screens which show you local highscores as well as controls.

I created all assets for the game (obviously some were heavily referenced). 

 For more information check out the gameplay video.
